quote: We pay the highest taxes anywhere in the world.  No country is higher, and we’re bringing them down--and I mean way down.
quotePlain: We pay the highest taxes anywhere in the world.  No country is higher, and we’re bringing them down–and I mean way down.
name: Donald Trump

claims.title: the US has highest tax rate in the world
claims.negative: the US doesn't have the highest tax rate in the world
claims.negativePlain: the US doesn’t have the highest tax rate in the world
